message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split it 90/10, but I'm sure you'll want to make a counteroffer.
Alice, your generosity is appreciated, but let's be realistic. How about a 70/30 split?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. Let's try a 60/40 split this time.  If we can't agree, the value of the money is only going to decrease further.
Alice, time is money, literally!  55/45 seems fair. Let's settle this before it depreciates further.
